title: I press launch on my client but my game nothing happens.
body: Please help, I open league of legends updated my game and pressed launch but no matter how long i wait nothing happens? Any suggestions on what i should do.

replies.body:
I'v been having this issue for days and i have tried everything, However the only thing that has been working for me is to downgrade or upgrade my graphics drivers and the league client will load after hitting launch. BUT if i reboot my PC i have to upgrade or downgrade my graphics drivers again just for it to work....
I am running on Windows 10... But Hopefully this helps others with this issue.

Usually this occurs when there's a brief connection error that causes the attempt to connect to the login server to fail.

As a first step, I'd recommend running through our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434) article to see if that helps.
hey i went thru the whole process and i uninstalled and re-installed and it keeps giving me the firewall blocking access even tho i have it turned off any ideas y?

I have tried just about everything I can find over the past week or so trying to figure out the issue. The issue started with the Launcher starting without properly finishing the patch (1% to done for a big patch not likely), this was fixed with resetting winsock. Next issue was that the launch button would be stuck on grey indefinitely after pressing, never doing anything other than asking me to accept terms/conditions. This was fixed by the latest patch it appears or through updating my Nvidia driver to the most recent version it seems. However now whenever I click the Launch button it will go grey for a few moments before returning to orange and nothing happening. 

I need muh League, I dunno what else I can do since I've already reinstalled the game as well. Server status is 100% always green n online for me, and the delete S_OK and release manifest isnt working at all either. Would anyone know how to help this poor summoner suffering league withdrawal?
Personally, I would suggest just running it as administrator as a first step, this fixes a surprising amount of problems. ;p
I had this same issue, only way I could fix it was to reinstall the game.

atleast you guys could get the launcher to open after I updated played a few games and logged out the launcher wont even re-open so I went thru a lot of process of elimination and now I cant even re-install cause the link is broken
this happened to me so i reinstalled, when i finally got into a game I could not connect and reconnect no matter what I tried.
